diagnosis.final_diagnosis: diverticulitis, septic thrombosis of IMV and splenic vein thrombus, E. coli bacteremia
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with left lower quadrant abdominal pain that worsened acutely, alongside symptoms of fever and a history of constipation with a dark bowel movement. Physical examination revealed tenderness in the left lower quadrant without rebound or guarding, supporting the diagnosis of diverticulitis. The presence of E. coli bacteremia was indicated by the discharge diagnosis.
